channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023090278
item.description:
Report X-2023090278

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered by QA during VSA coded by driver as code 6 refused because of damage. was taken to an Admin and opened to conduct inspection. DescribePack: loose caps resulted in internal leakage on one bottle out of 4 packaged. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazardous bin.

item.title: Report X-2023081861
item.description:
Report X-2023081861

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: FORT SMITH
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was a picked up by driver on route. It was placed on the top shelf in van. During transit it bounce around and fell over. DescribePack: The rim of the closure was cracked causing some of the liquid to spill out DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was place upright on floor of van
